channel.title: Packs on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Packs on ZooBerry

item.title: Sailords of Land and Water
item.description: The concavenator and irritator were two dinosaurs that lived during the Early Cretaceous period. Concavenator was a theropod dinosaur that lived in what is now Spain, while Irritator was a spinosaurid dinosaur that lived in what is now Brazil. Both dinosaurs were carnivorous and had unique features that set them apart.

item.title: Desert Pack
item.description: A collection of original desert-themed objects by Quivaz, with technical support from Casey.

item.title: Expansive Packs
item.description: Expansive packs are collections of mods that add a large number of mods from various ZT1 categories.

item.title: Myth Pack - Objects
item.description: A myth-themed object pack including a myth museum, ponds, rock formations, statues, and more.

item.title: Primeval Abyssal Pack
item.description: The Primeval Abyssal Pack includes prehistoric animals, statues, and the Primeval Abyssal Aquarium.

item.title: Star Wars Expansion Pack (SWEP)
item.description: The Star Wars Expansion Pack includes a Jawa, Ewok, Wookie, Wampa Ice Creature, and a new observation area object.

item.title: SWEP2
item.description: SWEP2 adds new Star Wars-themed content, including an updated Jawa, R2D2, Sandcrawler, and various statues and buildings.

item.title: Halloween Collab Pack 2024
item.description: A small collaboration pack from a few Zoo Tycoon 1 designers which adds in various items, foliage and animals in order to make your zoo feel a bit more seasonal.

item.title: Seekings of Depth
item.description: SeeKings of Depth is a mod pack that adds a variety of prehistoric sea creatures to Zoo Tycoon 1.

item.title: Dinosaur Digs Marketing Beta Pack
item.description: A pack that converts content from the Dinosaur Digs marketing beta to the retail version of the game.

item.title: Mexico Natural Icons Pack
item.description: A pack containing five new animals, five new foliage items, and five new animated scenery items.

item.title: Unlimited Feather Overload (U.F.O.)
item.description: A new expansion pack full of prehistoric fluffy pals!!

item.title: Toadally Batrocious Land Invaders
item.description: A pack full of ancient amphibians for your zoos! This pack is a Halloween gift for all of you! Toadally Batrocious (TB) is the third of the “Works on Lacking Stuff” projects.

item.title: Mischievous Erradicators of Outside Wildlife (M.E.O.W.)
item.description: Dedicated to my two cat sisters, Vega & Rigel, whose birthday is on September 7th. Also dedicated to all cat lovers!

item.title: Bug Mayhem
item.description: A little expansion pack containing items for a full terrarium of arthropods!

item.title: Wolves and Panthera Hunting Statues
item.description: Water placeable, Exhibit placeable(Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy)

item.title: WLP1 Scenery
item.description: Scenery, UCS File fixed, Water placeable, Exhibit placeable(Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy)

item.title: WLP1 Foliage Pack Part 6
item.description: Imported from Wildlife Park 1.

item.title: WLP1 Foliage Pack Part 5
item.description: Summary of the Wlp1 Foliage Pack Part 5 project

item.title: WLP1 Foliage Pack Part 4
item.description: A pack of trees.

item.title: WLP1 Foliage Pack Part 3
item.description: A pack of trees.

item.title: WLP1 Foliage Pack Part 2
item.description: A pack of trees.

item.title: WLP1 Foliage Pack Part 1
item.description: A pack of trees.

item.title: AOE2 New World Pile Walls
item.description: UCS File fixed, Water placeable, Exhibit placeable(Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy)

item.title: Emperor Watercourse
item.description: A pack of components that let you build water channels.

item.title: Brown Bear, Black and White Lion Statues
item.description: Six statues: 4x Brown Bear, 2x Lion Statues

item.title: AOE2 Remains of the Vessels
item.description: Tile:1x4, Water placeable, Placeable at the bottom of a tank, Exhibit placeable(Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy)

item.title: Anaconda and Turtle in the Water Statues
item.description: Tile:4x4, Water placeable, Exhibit placeable(Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy)

item.title: American Alligator in the Water Statue
item.description: Tile: 4x4, Water placeable, Exhibit placeable(Animals don’t feel happy or unhappy).
